title: kaNNaNAna kalviyai
sahitya:
kaNNanAna kalviyaip-paNNAna kalaiyuDan puNNiyanE aruLvAi ennuLLirundE


anupallavi

  eNNam uyarttiDa idayam kanindiDa innuyir vAzhvellAm un vELvi AghiDavE


caraNam    poruLuDai mErkkalai bhUta bhautik-kalai porundun tozhil vaLamai pongip-polindiDavE
aruLuDai yOgamum bhOgamum EkamAi Aruyir vAzhvu shuddhAnandamAgiDavE
